sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { getAllPhoto(){ this.db.getAllPhoto().subscribe(res=>{ this.arr=res; for(let i of this.arr) { i.image='data:image/jpeg;base64,'+i.image; } console.log(res); // console.log(this.retrieveResonse); // console.log(this.retrieveResonse.image) }) } }
